title: Bloomberg Breakaway CEO Summit with Wells Fargo CEO and Martha Stewart
itunes:title: Bloomberg Breakaway CEO Summit with Wells Fargo CEO and Martha Stewart
description:
Carol broadcasts from the Bloomberg Breakaway CEO Summit in NYC where he speaks to Wells Fargo CEO Tim Sloan on recovering and growing post accounting scandal. Martha Stewart, Entrepreneur and Chief Creative Officer at Sequential, talks about building he brand and becoming a strong leader. Nikki Barua, CEO at BeyondCurious, discusses creating a global platform to get women into data analytics and AI. Mohamad Ali, President & CEO at Carbonite, explains how to protect data in a highly connected world. Alan Colberg, CEO at Assurant, talks about the business of insuring the durability autonomous vehicles.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
